mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_a.product ( title, coverPicture, slidePictures, detailPictures, `desc`, price, originPrice, createTime, updateTime, status, categoryId ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{coverPicture}, #{slidePictures}, #{detailPictures}, #{desc}, #{price}, #{originPrice}, now(), NULL, #{status}, #{categoryId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE db_a.product SET title = #{title}, coverPicture = #{coverPicture}, slidePictures = #{slidePictures}, detailPictures = #{detailPictures}, `desc` = #{desc}, price = #{price}, originPrice = #{originPrice}, updateTime = now(), status = #{status}, categoryId = #{categoryId} WHERE product.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM db_a.product ORDER BY id
SELECT p.*, c.id as subCategoryId, c.categoryId as supCategoryId FROM db_a.product p inner join db_a.category c on p.categoryId = c.id WHERE p.id = #{id}

select c.categoryId as supId, p.id, p.productId, p.title, p.coverPicture, p.price, p.originPrice, p.`desc`, p.categoryId as subId from db_a.product p inner join db_a.category c on p.categoryId = c.id where p.status = 0 and p.stock > 0 and c.categoryId = #{supId} order by p.title limit 8 offset 0
select p.id, p.productId, p.title, p.desc, p.price, p.originPrice, p.coverPicture, p.mp4, p.webm from db_a.category sub inner join db_a.product p on sub.id = p.categoryId where p.categoryId = #{id}

select p.id, p.productId, p.coverPicture, p.title, p.price, p.originPrice, c.id as subCategoryId, c.categoryId as supCategoryId, round(min(price / originPrice) * 10) from db_a.product p inner join db_a.category c on p.categoryId = c.id where originPrice / price >= 2 group by (originPrice / price) order by 4
SELECT p.*, c.id as subCategoryId, c.categoryId as supCategoryId FROM db_a.product p inner join db_a.category c on p.categoryId = c.id WHERE p.title LIKE #{likeName}
